document_data.name: Jallian Horgontivar
document_data.mainbody: '''Jallian Horgontivar''' was a [[cleric]] of [[Lathander]] living in the small village of [[Feather Falls (village)|Feather Falls]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Jallian had achieved the rank of [[Morninglord]] and headed the temple known as the [[House of Morning]], the only temple of significance in [[Featherdale]] at the time. Under his order were 16 other priests and acolytes who also served Lathander.
